docs.text: Welcome to Sanp's blog What is this? This is a blog where I write about random techy / programming things I'm doing. Learn more about me in my About section. Posts Read the latest posts here . Blog stack To make this blog, I'm using: mkdocs , a static site framework The mkdocs cinder theme The mkdocs macros plugin Github pages to host

docs.text: About Me My name is Steve. I am a Software Engineer in Chicago and I'm interested in python , vim / neovim , scala , SQL , AWS, and big data. I'm also interested in learning more about functional programming. Links Link to my github . Link to my dotfiles .
